name: 鄭有進
objective: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉物件導向設計原理及 C++ 進階程式設計技術，內容含：1. C++ 物件模型 2. 類別與物件 3. 建構者與解構者 4. 繼承 5. 虛擬函式與多型 6. 運算子溢載 7. 例外處理 8. 泛型程式設計 9. 標準模板程式庫 10. 期末專題設計
schedule:
01 介紹 C++ 開發環境與作業繳交方式；Unit testing with GoogleTest
02 How to solve it - Example: applying how to solve it (math vector in C)
03 Inner product round 1/Inner product round 2
04 Inner product, round 3
05 handling I/O; inner product, round 4: refactoring into object 
06 Midterm 1: Lab test 1
07 special member functions: default constructor, copy constructor, 
     destructor shallow copy, deep copy
08 Convex polygon
09 Special member functions: copy assignment operator overloading; 
    return a reference to data member; encapsulation and delegation: 
    How do ConvexPolygon and Vector collaborate?
10 How To Solve It: Delegation from ConvexPolygon to Vector Sorting 
     Vectors with STL sort; Sorting Vertices of  a convex polygon; 
11 Simple Factory vs constructor for convex polygon;
     Polymorphism 
12 Midterm 2: Lab test 2
13 Design: Overloading vs. overriding vs. template
14 Programming with STL
15 file i/o; stream 
16 Matrix and linear transformation
17 Dynamic typed languages: Ruby and Python
18 Final: Lab test 3
